accountExists.title: THIS ACCOUNT ALREADY EXISTS
accountExists.description: Login to your account to access petitions and related features.

accountAbsent.title: CREATE OR LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
accountAbsent.description: Create or login in order to access petitions and related features.

accountInvalid.title: THIS ACCOUNT DOES NOT EXIST
accountInvalid.description: Create your account to access petitions and related features.

accountCreationFailure.title: FAILED TO CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT
accountCreationFailure.description: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again in a little while.

loginPasswordIncorrect.title: FAILED TO LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
loginPasswordIncorrect.description: The password you entered, to this account, is incorrect.

loginPasswordMismatch.title: FAILED TO LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
loginPasswordMismatch.description: The password you entered does not match. Please confirm the password.
